attributes.action: stop all development aid except direct humanitarian assistance, to countries whose governments spend resources on overtly unnnecessary assets such as presidential jets, or on military equipment beyond the minimum necessary for defence, and publicise the reasons for so doing within the respective countries.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The United Kingdom is one of the world's major foreign aid donors, and if DFID took this bold step it would attract world-wide attention and might well lead other donors to do likewise. It would also send a powerful message to the governments of the affected 'developing' countries.
